title: AUDIOVISUAL DAYS 2018
longTitle: AUDIOVISUAL DAYS 2018: Johanna Koljonen "Do or die"
description: Den femte Nostradamus-rapporten med den utmanande titeln ”Do or Die?” presenterades under Göteborg Film Festival 2018
longDescription: Den femte Nostradamus-rapporten med den utmanande titeln ”Do or Die?” presenterades under Göteborg Film Festival 2018

Här ger rapportens författare Johanna Koljonen en uppdaterad föreläsning som bland annat tar upp vad som kommer krävas av den europeiska filmbranschen de närmaste åren för att konkurrera på en global marknad i ständig förändring

title: Masterclass med Pia Olby

description: The Art of Writing for Television - the leap from book to script
shortDescription: The Art of Writing for Televis...
longDescription: The Art of Writing for Television - the leap from book to script

title: MASTERCLASS WITH JON PLOWMAN
longTitle: MASTERCLASS WITH JON PLOWMAN - HOW TO PRODUCE COMEDY BRONZE
description: The legendary british BBC producer Jon Plowman is the man behind humorous, innovative successes like Absolutely Fabulous, The Office and Extras
longDescription: The legendary british BBC producer Jon Plowman is the man behind humorous, innovative successes like Absolutely Fabulous, The Office and Extras
Over a career spanning nearly 40 years he has learned everything there is to know about TV comedy and has, moreover, written a book about it: “How to Produced Comedy Bronze

title: TV DRAMA VISION 2019
longTitle: TV DRAMA VISION 2019: Nostradamus @ TV Drama Vision: Streaming Shapes the Landscape
description: Nostradamus @ TV Drama Vision: Streaming Shapes the Landscape
longDescription: Nostradamus @ TV Drama Vision: Streaming Shapes the Landscape
Change in the world of episodic drama is accelerating thanks to the global expansion of the mega platforms, shifting fortunes at public broadcasters, and local streaming services on the rise

title: The 6th Nostradamus Report ”Relevance in a New Reality”
longTitle: The 6th Nostradamus Report ”Relevance in a New Reality” - Johanna Koljonen (part 1 of 2)
description: This year’s report, ”Relevance in a New Reality”, discusses the uncertain future of public funding, major movements on the streaming market, the role of cinema in the new value chain, potential paths forward for VR, and the need for a rebooted industry conversation around tech and shared challenges
longDescription: This year’s report, ”Relevance in a New Reality”, discusses the uncertain future of public funding, major movements on the streaming market, the role of cinema in the new value chain, potential paths forward for VR, and the need for a rebooted industry conversation around tech and shared challenges
